title: Surah Al-Fatiha
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ رَبِّ الْعٰلَمِیْنَ

All praise is due to Allah, Lord of all the worlds.

الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

مٰلِكِ یَوْمِ الدِّیْنِ

Master of the Day of Judgment.

اِیَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَ اِیَّاكَ نَسْتَعِیْنُ

You alone we worship, and You alone we ask for help.

اِهْدِنَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِیْمَ

Guide us to the straight path,

صِرَاطَ الَّذِیْنَ اَنْعَمْتَ عَلَیْهِمْ

The path of those upon whom You have bestowed Your favor.

غَیْرِ الْمَغْضُوْبِ عَلَیْهِمْ وَ لَا الضَّآلِّیْنَ

Not of those who have incurred Your wrath, nor of those who have gone astray.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah Al-Fil
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

اَلَمْ تَرَ كَیْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِاَصْحٰبِ الْفِیْلِ

Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the people of the Elephant?

اَلَمْ یَجْعَلْ كَیْدَهُمْ فِیْ تَضْلِیْلٍ

Did He not make their plan go astray?

وَّ اَرْسَلَ عَلَیْهِمْ طَیْرًا اَبَابِیْلَ

And He sent against them birds in flocks.

تَرْمِیْهِمْ بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّنْ سِجِّیْلٍ

Striking them with stones of hard clay.

فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّاْكُوْلٍ

Thus, He made them like eaten straw.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah Quraysh
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

لِاِیْلٰفِ قُرَیْشٍ

For the familiarity of the Quraysh,

اٖلٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَآءِ وَ الصَّیْفِ

Their familiarity with the journeys of winter and summer.

فَلْیَعْبُدُوْا رَبَّ هٰذَا الْبَیْتِ

Let them worship the Lord of this House,

ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍۢ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ

Who has fed them against hunger and secured them against fear.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah Al-Ma'un
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

اَرَءَیْتَ الَّذِیْ یُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّیْنِ

Have you seen the one who denies the Judgment?

فَذٰلِكَ الَّذِیْ یَدُعُّ الْیَتِیْمَ

That is the one who repulses the orphan.

وَ لَا یَحُضُّ عَلٰی طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِیْنِ

And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

فَوَیْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّیْنَ

So woe to those who pray,

الَّذِیْنَ هُمْ عَنْ صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُوْنَ

Who are heedless of their prayer.

الَّذِیْنَ هُمْ یُرَآءُوْنَ

Those who make a show of it.

وَ یَمْنَعُوْنَ الْمَاعُوْنَ

And withhold small kindnesses.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah Al-Kawthar
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

اِنَّاۤ اَعْطَیْنٰكَ الْكَوْثَرَ

Indeed, We have granted you Al-Kawthar.

فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَ انْحَرْ

So pray to your Lord and sacrifice.

اِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْاَبْتَرُ

Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah Al-Kafirun
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

قُلْ یٰۤاَیُّهَا الْكٰفِرُوْنَ

Say, O disbelievers,

لَاۤ اَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُوْنَ

I do not worship what you worship.

وَ لَاۤ اَنْتُمْ عٰبِدُوْنَ مَاۤ اَعْبُدُ

Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.

وَ لَاۤ اَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدْتُّمْ

Nor will I worship what you worship.

وَ لَاۤ اَنْتُمْ عٰبِدُوْنَ مَاۤ اَعْبُدُ

Nor will you worship what I worship.

لَكُمْ دِیْنُكُمْ وَ لِیَ دِیْنِ

To you your religion, and to me mine.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah An-Nasr
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

اِذَا جَآءَ نَصْرُ اللّٰهِ وَ الْفَتْحُ

When the victory of Allah and the conquest comes,

وَ رَاَیْتَ النَّاسَ یَدْخُلُوْنَ فِیْ دِیْنِ اللّٰهِ اَفْوَاجًا

And you see people entering Allah’s religion in multitudes,

فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَ اسْتَغْفِرْهُ ؕ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ تَوَّابًا

Then glorify your Lord with praise and seek His forgiveness. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah Al-Lahab
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

تَبَّتْ یَدَاۤ اَبِیْ لَهَبٍ وَّ تَبَّ

May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.

مَاۤ اَغْنٰی عَنْهُ مَالُهٗ وَ مَا كَسَبَ

His wealth and what he earned will not avail him.

سَیَصْلٰی نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ

He will burn in a blazing fire.

وَّ امْرَاَتُهٗ ؕ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ

And his wife, the carrier of firewood.

فِیْ جِیْدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّنْ مَّسَدٍ

Around her neck is a rope of twisted palm fiber.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah Al-Ikhlas
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

قُلْ هُوَ اللّٰهُ اَحَدٌ

Say, He is Allah, the One.

اَللّٰهُ الصَّمَدُ

Allah, the Eternal Refuge.

لَمْ یَلِدْ وَ لَمْ یُوْلَدْ

He neither begets nor is begotten.

وَ لَمْ یَكُنْ لَّهٗ كُفُوًا اَحَدٌ

Nor is there to Him any equivalent.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah Al-Falaq
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

قُلْ اَعُوْذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ

Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of the dawn,

مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

From the evil of what He created,

وَ مِنْ شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ اِذَا وَقَبَ

And from the evil of darkness when it settles,

وَ مِنْ شَرِّ النَّفّٰثٰتِ فِی الْعُقَدِ

And from the evil of the blowers in knots,

وَ مِنْ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ اِذَا حَسَدَ

And from the evil of an envier when he envies.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)

title: Surah An-Nas
data:
بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ

In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

قُلْ اَعُوْذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ

Say, I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

مَلِكِ النَّاسِ

The King of mankind,

اِلٰهِ النَّاسِ

The God of mankind,

مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ ۙ۬ الْخَنَّاسِ

From the evil of the whisperer who withdraws,

الَّذِیْ یُوَسْوِسُ فِیْ صُدُوْرِ النَّاسِ

Who whispers in the breasts of mankind,

مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَ النَّاسِ

From among the jinn and mankind.

Source: Tafsir-e-Usmani (Written by Shaykhul Islam Maulana Shabbir Ahmad Usmani, translated into Bengali by Maulana Giyasuddin Ahmad)
